means: 无价值的东西( trifle的名词复数 )
轻视，小看( trifle的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: He had no money to spare on trifles.
sentence.Network_cn: 他没有闲钱买些小玩意儿。

sentence.Network_en: I don't know why you waste your time on such trifles.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不明白你为什么在这种琐事上浪费时间.

sentence.Network_en: I hate that they should be worried about trifles.
sentence.Network_cn: 真遗憾,他们竟为区区小事发愁.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Don ' t waste your time and energy on trifles ., 别把你的时间和精力浪费在琐事上.
great events make me quiet and calm ; it is only trifles that irritate my nerves事件使我平静和从容；只有那些琐事才令我心烦
TRANQUILLITY . Be not disturbed at trifles , or at accidents common or unavoidable ., 宁静 -- 勿为琐事或普通和不可避免的意外事件而自扰.
He has no time to bother with trifles ., 他无时间去打发这些琐事.

list.abs: Small-scale ... ... 音阶 musical scale 小意思 small token;mere trifle 三五成群 forming groups of three or squads of five.
稍_百度百科 ... 4. 稍胜一筹[ a little bit better] 5. 稍微[ a little;a bit;a trifle] 6. 稍为[ a little].
关于thought... ... Expectation or conception: 观念：意向或观念： A trifle;a bit: 一点；些微： 2010-09-24 thought 什么意思 37.
trifle中文 ... - Pumpkin mousse trifle 南瓜慕斯;南瓜幕斯; trifle with 视同儿戏 trifle 琐事.
trifle中文 ... touch up 修饰，改进 trifle with 玩弄，轻视，不严肃对待 too much to say 过言。.

entry.tran: (尤用于缓和程度)有一点，稍微
entry.def: You can use a trifle to mean slightly or to a small extent, especially in order make something you say seem less extreme.

example.ex: As a photographer, he'd found both locations just a trifle disappointing...
example.tran: 作为摄影师，他感到两处景点都有点儿不尽如人意。

example.ex: 'There we go,' said Diane, a trifle too cheerily…
example.tran: “这就对了，”黛安娜说道，语气有点儿过于兴高采烈。

entry.tran: 小事;琐事;无价值的东西
entry.def: A trifle is something that is considered to have little importance, value, or significance.

example.ex: He had no money to spare on trifles...
example.tran: 他没有闲钱买些小玩意儿。

example.ex: Believe me, it's the least I can do, a mere trifle.
example.tran: 相信我，这是我最起码能做的了，只是小事一桩。

entry.tran: 屈莱弗甜食，乳脂蛋糕（由松糕、果冻、水果和蛋奶沙司层叠制成的冷甜点，通常覆有奶油）
entry.def: Trifle is a cold dessert made of layers of sponge cake, jelly, fruit, and custard, and usually covered with cream.

auth_sentence.content: Curiosity...may be dissipated in trifles or congealed by indolence.

auth_sentence.content: They became pernickety about small things, always fussing about trifles.
auth_sentence.res_content: They became pernickety about small things, always fussing about trifles.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They became pernickety about small things, always fussing about trifles.
